word:
Not to Exalt Fellow Men.--The Lord has not laid the burden upon any to elevate, praise, and exalt men and women, even though their work may 
                                                                           21
have been to turn the attention of the people to things of highest importance, to the things that concern the salvation of the soul, and shall our time and space be given to glorifying those who have been at work to raise false issues? The Lord has given to every man his work, and to those whom He has placed in positions of responsibility, either in writing, or in speaking, He says, "Your work is to preach the word."
